Plot: The story of an illiterate Lady Sarpanch (Village Chief), who is a puppet in the hands of her Husband, an ex-Sarpanch (Village Chief). But, when she becomes aware of her power being misused by her husband...she turns the table.
Title: Adhikaar
Actors: Savita Bhargav, Arvind Bilgaiyan, Ashok Bulani, Vijay Dindorkar
